name: Healthyfied Chicken Sandwich Filling
description: This Healthyfied Chicken Sandwich Filling is perfect for those looking for a high-protein, low-carb option. It's seasoned with just the right amount of spices and dressed with a touch of mayonnaise, making it a delicious addition to your healthy recipe collection. Whether you're on a health kick or just looking for something delicious and nutritious, this sandwich filling fits the bill.

recipeInstructions.text: Shred the cooked chicken breast into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the diced onion, shredded chicken breast, organic coconut aminos, ground black pepper, salt, and mayonnaise.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients until well combined and the chicken is evenly coated with the mayonnaise and seasoning mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture rest in the refrigerator for about 15 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
